source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_00<tab>Alas, Shigure seems utterly devoid of hair and hope...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_00<tab>松葉門外広場のシグレは、冒険者に近況を報告したいようだ。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_01Inspector's Log:
Joy and dismay walk hand in hand this day, for while we have at last brought the notorious Wolf Burglar of Kugane to justice, the Soboro Sukehiro was lost to us once more! In the affable yet enigmatic swordsman Jim, I was so certain we had found a new friend, but alas, when the opportunity presented itself, he absconded with Master Akebono's most legendary of swords. Disappointing as this turn of events may be, my faithful assistants and I must rally our spirits and resume the chase, for Jim must answer for his misdeeds!
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
Although the Wolf Burglar is in the custody of the Sekiseigumi, the wandering swordsman Yojimbo and the Soboro Sukehiro are in the wind. Rejoined by Inspector Hildibrand, Nashu, and a certain gentlemanly zombie, you weigh your options and conclude that when at first you do not succeed, make inquiries of the townsfolk again, and pray that one divulges information of interest.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_01前回までの冒険録：
ヨウジンボウと協力し、こそドロ一匹オオカミを捕まえることに成功した冒険者たち。無事にソボロ助広を奪還したと思いきや、ヨウジンボウに取り逃げされてしまう。かくして、ふたたびソボロ助広を追うことになった一行。今度こそ、取り戻すことはできるのだろうか……。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
ヨウジンボウについての有力な情報を得られていない、シグレとヒルディブランド。そこへ、エオルゼアへ戻ったはずの紳士的なゾンビーもやってきて、共に情報を集めることとなった。クガネでヨウジンボウの情報を知っている住民がいないか、聞き込みをしよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_02<tab>A good investigation could perhaps be likened to a pot of stew, in that sometimes one needs to let it sit and simmer. Alas, it would seem that this might not be the case in this instance, for it is not for lack of developments that your inquiries bear little fruit. Rather, the people of Kugane express a shared reluctance to cooperate with any investigation given the detainment of the Wolf Burglar, who it seems is held in rather high regard due to the questionable morals of his targets and the generosity he has shown to the poor and downtrodden...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_02<tab>住民に聞き込みをした。知り得た情報を、松葉門外広場の「シグレ」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_03That the Wolf Burglar was so beloved of the people comes as a surprise to Shigure, who believed him devoid of redeeming qualities. Though the law is the law, he knows not how to proceed if the public is unwilling to cooperate...leading the others to suggest not only that he adopt a new guise for a time, but that they also question the Wolf Burglar himself, for a man so popular and trusted may be privy to secrets─and since both he and Yojimbo had designs on the Soboro Sukehiro, they may even be connected in some manner.

You and the others accompany Shigure to the gaol in which the Wolf Burglar is held, and together you appeal to his better nature and ask that he divulge any pertinent information. The Lupin is more than willing to do so...provided that he is set free. Naturally, Shigure is unwilling to even consider this condition for a moment, and it is only at the urging of Inspector Hildibrand and the others that he relents and states that he will request that the prisoner be released temporarily into his custody. Time being of the essence, the inspector and his assistant take matters into their own hands, using the occasion to present to Shigure a hair tonic of surpassing effectiveness that will restore to him his lost locks. The resulting explosion of light not only transforms Shigure's scalp into the envy of every follicly challenged man, but serves to blind the gaol guard and allow the Gentle Dead Man, aided by his werewolf attire, to switch places with the Lupin thief, after which the group beats a hasty retreat.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_03<tab>シグレに報告した。牢にいる一匹オオカミなら、何か知っているかもしれないということで、話を聞きにいった一行。ヒルディブランドたちは、事件の捜査に協力すると申し出た一匹オオカミの提案に乗る形で、一匹オオカミを牢から逃がす。楽座街の「シグレ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_04<tab>The Wolf Burglar is free, and the Sekiseigumi appear to be none the wiser─for now. How long the deception will last remains to be seen, and so Shigure bids you follow him and the others into the waterways below, where your Lupin comrade seeks to find answers.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_04<tab>シグレと話した。一足先に地下水路へ向かったヒルディブランドたちを追いかけ、楽座街にいる「こそドロ一匹オオカミ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_05<tab>Away from the prying eyes of the law-abiding populace of Kugane, the Wolf Burglar introduces Shigure and the others to a merry band of rogues and scalawags. One of their number, Koju, is wary of placing his trust in a man of the Sekiseigumi, but the Lupin implores him not to be so quick to judge─and for Shigure to return the favor. Though Koju has no news of Yojimbo nor the Soboro Sukehiro to share, he assures you that, had the ronin attempted to sell the sword, he would have heard of it by now. This leads all present to deduce that Yojimbo may have stolen the sword for himself, and if he is indeed a collector of priceless and powerful weapons, then it stands to reason he would continue to seek out and obtain others. The only other comparable blade that comes to mind is the Ame-no-Murakumo, a fabled sword of eld said to have been wielded by the great kami Susano─with which you are intimately acquainted, as you inform the others. And so it is decided that the hunt for the samurai and the sword will continue in the Ruby Sea.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_05<tab>こそドロ一匹オオカミと話した。地下水路にいるコウジュと話したところ、ヨウジンボウは名刀の収集家で、次は「アメノムラクモ」を狙うのではないかという。ヨウジンボウに繋がる足がかりとして、紅玉海を調べることにしたヒルディブランドたち。楽座街の「シグレ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_06<tab>Before Shigure can continue onward, he has a mind to heed the others' advice and change into less conspicuous garments that do not declare his Sekiseigumi allegiance to all and sundry. The simplest course of action would be for him to change into his previous attire, but if your trials and travails with Inspector Hildibrand have taught you anything, it is that people do not always avail themselves of common sense...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEQ_06<tab>シグレと話した。済ませたい用事があるというシグレと一旦別れ、再び紅玉台場で落ち合うことを約束したのであった。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_000<tab>You look well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I pray your adventures have not been too taxing.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、ご無沙汰しております。
調子はいかがでござるか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_001<tab>As for myself...the search for the Soboro Sukehiro, as well as Yojimbo, continues. Would that I could claim even a measure of progress...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_001拙者はあれから、ソボロ助広を取り逃げした、
ヨウジンボウを探すべく、聞き込みを続けてきました。
ですが、なかなか有力な情報を得られておらず……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_002<tab>Ah, Shigure! There you are!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_002<tab>こちらにおりましたか！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_100_002<tab>We thought perhaps to find you inside, my bald man, but I see you are here, and in the company of my stalwart assistant!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_100_002屯所にいるかと思い、中を探してしまいましたぞ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、ヒグレ殿、
ご機嫌いかがですかな？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_003<tab>Bald? You of all people should...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_003<tab>シ、シグレでござる……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_004<tab>Having failed to seize upon new information of value or even passing relevance, we were in the midst of reconsidering our investigative strategy. But tell me─have you word of Jim and our missing sword?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_004私といえば、いまひとついい情報をキャッチできず、
捜査の方針を考え直そうと思っていたところですぞ。
マグレ殿は、ヨウジンボウ殿の足取りを掴めましたかな？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_005<tab>Jim? Who is─ Ah, yes, Yojimbo. No, no, as I was just telling <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I have made no progress since last we spoke...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_005だから、シグレであると……
いや、ともかく、こちらも収穫はなしでござる。
困ってしまいましたな……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_006<tab>You seem distressed, Shigure. If you yet pine for your lost locks, then pine no longer, for we have brought you a hair tonic of preternatural effectiveness!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_006そういえば、約束してた毛生え薬を持ってきました！
これで、元気出してください～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_007<tab>Really!? Well, that...that is actually a very considerate gesture. Thank you.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_007なんと！
本当にそのようなものがあったとは……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_008<tab>Why not try it right now?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_008<tab>今度、使ってみてください～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_009<tab>Aye, aye, the sooner the better, perhaps...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_009で、では、お言葉に甘えて、
どこか時間を見つけて試させてもらうでござる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_010<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_010<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_011<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_011<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_012<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_012<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_013<tab>I say, to meet with Master Zombibrand and his bosom companions yet again! Truly, the kami have been kind to me!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_013お久しぶりデス、先生！
まさか、こんなトコロで再会するとハ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_014<tab>'Tis always a pleasure to see a man of the old horde. But were you not bound for Eorzea? Why are you yet in the Far East?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_014おや、奇遇ですな！
しかし、貴方はエオルゼアへと帰ったはずでは？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_015<tab>Indeed, I had thought to return home and rejoin my brothers, and to that end did I call upon a local fisherman to secure passage. 'Twas from him that I heard a tale most fascinating which compelled me to stay.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_015あの後、帰るための小舟を譲ってもらおうと、
地元の漁師さんに声をかけたのデスガ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_016<tab>A funa yurei─a Far Eastern variety of undead─had been seen wandering an isle's shore. As my previous attempts to recruit fellow zombies had met with failure, I thought why not broaden my criteria, and appeal to this ghost in the spirit of camaraderie?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_016聞いてしまったのデスヨ。
「船幽霊」という新たな死霊の噂を……！
そこで、ゾンビー紳士団にスカウトしていこうかと思ったのデス！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_017<tab>Alas, it is a most elusive quarry. Rather shy, it would seem. I sought to learn more of the funa yurei by questioning the people of this city, but have been unsuccessful thus far.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_017ただ、船幽霊サンはシャイな死霊のようでして、
なかなか会うことができず、目撃情報を集めていたのデス。
もっとも、今のところ空振りなのデスガネ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_018<tab>I see, I see. I realize this is sudden, but in your inquiries, did you hear mention of Jim?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_018ふむ、そのような事情があったのですな。
ところで、ここクガネで聞き込みをしていたようですが、
ヨウジンボウという名前を聞きませんでしたかな？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_019<tab>Jim? I fear I have heard naught of that particular Far Eastern spirit. Though, to be honest, not all have been willing to entertain my company, perhaps due to my undead nature...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_019ヨウジン……ボウ？
そのような死霊については、聞いたことがありませんネ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_020<tab>It pains me to hear that, in this world, there remain people prejudiced against the living impaired...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_020<tab>なるほど……貴方の腐った耳にも入っていませんか……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_021<tab>You seek this Jim, Master Zombibrand? If so, I should be glad to help!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_000_021先生、探し人デスカ？
でしたら、私も協力しまショウ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_100_021<tab>Grateful as we would be, it might be wise to change your attire. The people's reluctance to speak with you may be due to your passing resemblance to a certain wolfish fugitive who, until recently, terrorized the city.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_100_021ご協力いただけるのはありがたいのでござるが、
その、オオカミのような格好だと悪目立ちしてしまうかと……。
情報を集めるには、不向きだと思われます。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_110_021<tab>Oh! How careless of me. I shall change into something less conspicuous at once!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_ZOMBIEA_110_021おっト！
それでは、着替えるとしまス！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_022<tab>Then it is settled! When at first you don't succeed, make inquiries again. Let us split up and speak with the men and women of Kugane!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_022助かりますぞ！
ならば、もう一度、みなで手分けをして、
クガネの人たちから、話を聞いて回るのです！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_023<tab>So...that's it? Everyone is simply going to ask after Jim again? I mean, if it so happens to lead to something, that's all well and good, but...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_023何かしらヨウジンボウに繋がる情報が、
手に入るとよいのでござるが……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_TSURUBAMI_000_030<tab>Oh, you're also pursuing that Yojimbo fellow? The Sekiseigumi were asking after him the other day. I'll tell you what I told them: I've never heard of the man.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_TSURUBAMI_000_030あら、あなたもヨウジンボウとかいう人を追っているのです？
ちょっと前に赤誠組の人からも、同じことを聞かれましたが、
ごめんなさい、何も知りません。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_TSURUBAMI_000_031<tab>And just between you and me...even if I did know something, I don't know if I would want to tell them...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_TSURUBAMI_000_031そうだ……もし、赤誠組にお知り合いがいるようなら、
伝えておいてほしいことがあるのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_TSURUBAMI_000_032<tab>You know the Kugane Wolf Burglar? The one they locked away? Rumor has it they intend to inflict upon him terrible punishments for his so-called crimes. Madness, I tell you, madness!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_TSURUBAMI_000_032この間、捕まった一匹オオカミさんに、
どうか寛大な処置をと、お願いしたくて……。
彼は盗人かもしれないけど「義賊」だったんです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_TSURUBAMI_000_033<tab>Every single one of the burglar's “victims” were among the most notorious scoundrels of the city! Greedy merchants with no scruples whatsoever. What's more, everything he stole he gave to the poor and needy. And yet they decry him as a villain! Fools!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_TSURUBAMI_000_033狙うのは、あこぎな商売をする悪い商人ばかり。
しかも、盗んで手に入れたお金を貧しい家庭や、
恵まれない子どもに配っていたんですから……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KEISETSU_000_034<tab>Yojimbo, you say? Hmm... The name does ring a bell...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KEISETSU_000_034ヨウジンボウ？
うーん、どこかで聞いたような……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KEISETSU_000_035<tab>Ah, yes, now I recall. The Lupin fellow was asking after him as well, though that was some time ago. He's since been detained by the Sekiseigumi─the Lupin, not your Yojimbo, that is.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KEISETSU_000_035そうだ、以前にオオカミのお兄さんから、
同じ名前を聞いたような気がします。
お兄さん、赤誠組に捕まってしまいましたが……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KEISETSU_000_036<tab>Not that I can imagine why. He's no criminal. Why, when I told him of how my mother had taken ill, he gave me the koban to purchase her medicine, without my asking or anything.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KEISETSU_000_036優しい方ですのに……。
以前、私の母が倒れてしまって困っていたら、
薬代だと言って、お金をくださったのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KEISETSU_000_037<tab>They say he's done terrible things, but a man like that... No, I refuse to believe it. If there's any justice in this world, he'll be set free...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KEISETSU_000_037そんなお兄さんが、捕まるような悪さを働いていたなんて、
にわかには信じられないのです。
早く釈放されることを願ってやみません……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_038<tab>Let me guess: you are searching for a man named Yojimbo? The Sekiseigumi questioned me about him not long ago. Very desperate to find him, they were.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_038ヨウジンボウねぇ……。
赤誠組の隊士たちも、同じ名前のヤツを、
血眼になって探し回っていたっけか。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_039<tab>I doubt they will receive much help from the populace at present, though...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_039ただ、しばらくは、
クガネに住む者から有力な情報を得るのは難しいかもね。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_040<tab>Why, you ask? Surely you've heard. The Kugane Wolf Burglar has been arrested.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_040なんでかって？
この間、赤誠組が一匹オオカミを捕まえたろう？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_041<tab>Despite what the wealthy elite would have you believe, he is no demon deserving of the harshest sentence. If anything, he is a hero to the downtrodden, having shared his spoils with the least among us.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_041奴が、ただの「こそドロ」なら、それで済んだかもしれない。
だけど実際のところ、一匹オオカミは庶民の間では、
弱きを助ける天下の義賊として大人気だったのさ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_042<tab>If you ask me, the Sekiseigumi ought to take a closer look at the merchants he targeted. Akebono, in particular, has been at the center of many dark rumors...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_042一方で、被害者ヅラをしているアケボノは、
黒い噂が絶えない悪徳商人ときたもんだ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_043<tab>Anyway, in light of the Wolf Burglar's detainment, many are less than willing to aid the Sekiseigumi in their activities. And unfortunately, if they suspect you to be working with them, you too may find your overtures rebuffed...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_043そんなわけで、庶民は赤誠組に反感を抱いているのさ。
だから、赤誠組が追うヨウジンボウとやらに対しても、
何も話すもんかって連中も多いはずだよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_TSURUBAMI_000_044<tab>Haven't I seen you in the company of the Sekiseigumi? If you've friends among them, surely you can make them see reason and show the Wolf Burglar mercy?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_TSURUBAMI_000_044赤誠組にお知り合いがいるなら、
一匹オオカミさんのこと、伝えてくださいね？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KEISETSU_000_045<tab>I don't know if they were friends, but I do remember the Lupin fellow asking after Yojimbo. Not recently, though...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KEISETSU_000_045以前に、オオカミのお兄さんから、
ヨウジンボウという名前を聞いたような気がします。
お兄さん、赤誠組に捕まってしまいましたが……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_046<tab>I'm afraid I cannot help you, friend. Nor do I think you will find others willing to accommodate you...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_BYAKUDAN_000_046ヨウジンボウねぇ……。
赤誠組の隊士たちも、同じ名前のヤツを、
血眼になって探し回っていたっけか。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_050<tab>...I see. And what have you learned, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、何か情報を掴めたでござるか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_Q1_000_000<tab>何か情報を掴めた？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_A1_000_001<tab>Not much about Yojimbo, I'm afraid...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_A1_000_001<tab>ヨウジンボウについての情報は少ない

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_A1_000_002<tab>Apparently a certain Lupin is rather well loved...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_A1_000_002<tab>一匹オオカミは庶民から好かれていた

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_051<tab>Huh. I had no idea the plight of the Wolf Burglar weighed upon the minds of so many. What exactly did they say?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_051ふむ……皆、ヨウジンボウよりも、
捕縛された一匹オオカミを心配していた、と……。
そのあたりの事情を、詳しくお聞かせ願えるか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_052<tab>A hero to the poor and downtrodden? A criminal who simply <var 1A 02 /var>gave away<var 1A 01 /var> his hard-won spoils? This...this is all quite unexpected...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_052奴が義賊として庶民に愛されていたとは……
全く知らなかったでござる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_053<tab>But whatever aspersions they may cast upon his victims, the law is the law. Even disreputable merchants are deserving of fair and equitable treatment. To ignore their plight is to let the mob decide their fate.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_053しかし、仮に悪徳商人からだと言っても、
盗みは犯罪であり、見逃せるものではござらぬ。
そのような悪人が人気者と讃えられようとは……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_054<tab>That said, to hear that some may withhold information in protest is cause for concern. As a man of the Sekiseigumi, I cannot help but feel conflicted.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_054そして気になるのは、正義を遂行したはずの赤誠組が、
一匹オオカミを捕らえたことで、反感を買いつつあること……。
隊士として、無視はできぬのでござる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_055<tab>If I may, Shigure─it might be best to dress in less conspicuous clothing, at least for the time being.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_055しばらくの間、赤誠組の羽織を脱いだほうが、
情報を集めやすいかもしれませんな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_056<tab>I hate to say it, but that is a sensible suggestion. Surprisingly. Perhaps I should make use of my old kimono.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_056たしかに、事件屋殿のおっしゃるとおりかもしれませぬな……。
着物を用立てておくでござる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_057<tab>Yet even if I were to do so, my face is already known. They would mark me as a Sekiseigumi, and perhaps even resent my attempts to deceive them...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_057しかし、これでいよいよ万策尽きたでござるな。
庶民がだんまりを決め込んでいるとあっては、
情報も集めようがない……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_058<tab>I've got an idea! Why not ask the Wolf Burglar? If he's so popular with the people, who knows what secrets they've told him?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_058オオカミさんに聞くのはどうですか～？
人気者さんなら、いろいろ知ってるかもしれません～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_059<tab>Ask...the Wolf Burglar?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_059<tab>ヤツに話を……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_060<tab>Hmm... If both he and Yojimbo had designs on the Soboro Sukehiro, then it's possible they might know one another...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_060……ふむ、ソボロ助広という、
同じ獲物を狙っていた者同士ということもある、か……。
聞いてみない手はないように思えるでござる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_061<tab>Well done, Nashu! I was but mere moments from reaching the selfsame conclusion!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_061さすがはナシュ！
ちょうど私も、そう考えていたところですぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_062<tab>It's settled, then. Let us go and question the prisoner without further delay.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_062そうと決まったら、さっそく話を聞きに、
ヤツのいる牢に向かうでござる！
「赤誠組の牢番」に、面会の許可を申請せねば！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_063<tab>Greetings and well met, comrade. If I might have a moment of your time?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_063ご足労いただき、かたじけない。
実は、お願いしたいことがあるのでござる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_064<tab>That we might ascertain the whereabouts of the fugitive Yojimbo, we wish to speak with the Kugane Wolf Burglar. Will you permit us to enter?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_064ヨウジンボウの行方の手がかりを掴むために、
一匹オオカミに話を伺いたいのでござる。
面会を許可していただけませんでしょうか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_065<tab>Certainly, Shigure, if it will aid you in your investigation. Follow me.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_065そういった用件なら、勿論構いませんよ。
ささ、こちらへ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_066<tab>I trust you are enjoying our hospitality. I come bearing questions.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_066久しぶりでござる。
少しばかり、お主に尋ねたいことがあってな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_067<tab>Questions, eh? For little ol' me, you say?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_067<tab>……いったい、オイラに何を聞きたいっていうんだい？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_068<tab>Following your arrest, the ronin Yojimbo absconded with the Soboro Sukehiro you stole from Master Akebono. He remains at large.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_068お主を捕まえた後、
ヨウジンボウがソボロ助広を取り逃げしてな……。
捜索しているものの、一向に行方がつかめずにいるのだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_069<tab>We have reason to believe the sword was his objective all along. Given that it was yours as well, I thought you might know something of the man and his motive.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_069同じくソボロ助広を狙っていたお主ならば、
何か思い当たるフシがあるのではないかと思ってな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_070<tab>...Everyone knows that sword's worth a bloody fortune and then some.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_070ふ～ん、なるほどねぇ……
まぁ、真っ先に思いつくのは金銭目的かな。
目玉が飛び出るほど、高値がつく名刀だからさ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_071<tab>But finding a buyer for a masterpiece as famous as the Soboro Sukehiro─especially after word of its theft has spread far and wide, well...good luck with that, says I.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_071けど、あれだけ名の知れた刀となると、
盗品だってすぐバレるから、売りさばくのも楽じゃない。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_072<tab>Why, they'd surely have to avail themselves of the services of certain disreputable folks with whom I happen to be intimately acquainted. I'd be happy to introduce you lot...as soon as you set me free.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_072でも、オイラが繋がりのある裏社会の連中なら、
盗品専門の闇市にも詳しいから……
この縄を解いてくれるなら、話をつけてやってもいいぜ？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_073<tab>What!? Absolutely not! That is out of the question!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_073<tab>そっ、そのような真似が、できるわけがなかろう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_074<tab>Then we've got nothing more to discuss. Best be on your way.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_074……それなら、この話はオシマイ。
てめぇたちで、なんとかするこったな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_075<tab>Now, now, Shigure. Let us not be too quick to judge! If the goodly men and women of Kugane are willing to trust in his good intentions, then perhaps we should as well!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_075シグレ殿、街の方々に話を聞いてわかったとおり、
一匹オオカミ殿も根っからの悪党ではなさそうです。
提案に乗ってみるのも、手かと思いますぞ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_076<tab>An awful lot of people were willing to vouch for his character. If what they say is true, then it would be wrong to see him hanged...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_076弱きを助ける天下の義賊、でござるか……。
確かに、このまま盗人として縛り首にされるのは惜しいと、
拙者も思うところでござる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_077<tab>I will propose to my superiors that you be temporarily released into our custody for the purposes of our investigation. Should you abide by the terms of our arrangement, you may receive leniency. What say you?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_077事件の捜査に協力したとなれば、恩赦にも繋がるはず。
情報収集の後、必ず牢に戻る……
逃げ出さぬと誓うなら、お主の話に乗るがどうする？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_078<tab>I say you've got yourself a deal, baldy.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_078<tab>へへっ、そうこなくっちゃな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_079<tab>Will they even consider my proposal, though? The deliberations alone may prove time-consuming, and if they refuse...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_079とはいえ、この件の許可を上に求めたとて、
簡単に認めていただけるとも思えぬでござる。
ううむ、どうしたものか……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_080<tab>Remind me, Nashu: do you have that hair tonic on you?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_080<tab>そういえばナシュ、毛生え薬はありますかな？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_081<tab>I sure do, Inspector!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_081<tab>あります～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_082<tab>Now's as good a time as ever to try it, don't you think?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_082<tab>さっそく使ってみてください～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_083<tab>Here? In the gaol? Well, uh, far be it from me to refuse...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_083い、今これを使うのでござるか？
なぜ唐突に、今なのでござるか……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_084<tab>Remember to use the whole bottle, my good man! Pour it over your head until not a single drop remains!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_084さぁ、遠慮はいりませんぞ。
パシャっとかけてください！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_085<tab>That seems rather wasteful, but if you insist.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_085わ、わかったでござる。
こうでござるか……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_086<tab>I feel...strange. Like my scalp is... Oh... Oh! By the kami!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_086む……むむむっ！？
これは……おおおおぉぉぉ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_087<tab>Shigure? Are you all right? I heard you shouting─
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_087騒々しいぞ！
いったいどうしたというのだ！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_088<tab>The Light...it binds them... They are too many!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_088ま、眩しい！
こ、これはいったい……！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_089<tab>And turn and flex and shake and bounce...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_089<tab>これを、こうして、こうすれば……

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_090<tab>Perfection! Rejoice, my goodly burglar, as I, Hildibrand, agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire, have liberated you from your unjust imprisonment!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_090これで完璧ですぞ！　さぁ、こちらへ！
このヒルディブランドが、
みなさんを外までエスコートいたしますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_091<tab>Now see here, Inspector!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_091<tab>お、お待ちくだされ～っ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_092<tab>Huh!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_092<tab>！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_093<tab>What happened!? Has the prisoner escaped!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_093<tab>……ざ、罪人は！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_094<tab>Still in his cell, I see... But what in the world was that blinding light!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_094逃げてはいない……か。
しかし、あの神々しい光はどこから？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_095<tab>A thousand pardons! One of my associates was...carrying small explosives, one of which detonated unexpectedly! I, of course, bade her take the others outside immediately, for safety's sake! I believe that explains that, yes? Yes!? Right, then! If you will excuse me!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_095きっ、協力者たちの持ち物が、暴発したようでござる！
い、今はともかく、彼らの安全を確認するのが先決……
拙者はこれにて御免ッ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_096<tab>Hm? Ah, yes, of course. Very good.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_096<tab>む、あぁ……承知した。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_097<tab>Wait...when did Shigure regrow his hair?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SEKISEIGUMIJAILER_000_097あれは、シグレか？
髪が生えていたような……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_098<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_098<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_099<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_099<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_100<tab>How we managed to escape undetected, I have no idea. I can but pray that our ruse will remain intact...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_100うまくやり過ごせるか、とても不安ですが、
見つからないことを祈るばかりでござる……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_101<tab>The Wolf Burglar led the others into the waterways below. We should follow.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_101事件屋殿たちは、一足先に、地下水路の方に向かいました。
我々も、向かうとするでござる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_110<tab>Been down here before? If so, you might have met my friends already. A contemptible lot, all Kugane's castoffs. If anyone's heard a peep from your quarry, it'd be them.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_110この水路に入ったことはあるかい？
この先のどん詰まりが、裏社会の連中のたまり場になってるんだ。
あいつらなら、何か情報を持ってるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_111<tab>Come on, then, don't be shy...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_111<tab>さぁ、行くとしようぜ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_120<tab>Ho, you're looking well for a rat bastard.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_120よっ！
元気でやってるか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_121<tab>Takes a wolf to know a rat, hah! To what do we owe the pleasure? And more importantly, how'd you slip free of the Sekiseigumi's noose?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_121おぉ、ワンすけじゃねぇか！？
たしかお前、赤誠組にしょっぴかれたんじゃなかったか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_122<tab>With my dashing good looks and my silver tongue, how else? But never you mind that─I need information, Koju.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_122へへっ、ちょっといろいろあって、出してもらったのさ！
ところで聞きたいことがあるんだけど、いいか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_123<tab>Do you, now? Or is the Sekiseigumi at your shoulder the one askin' questions?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_123おう……ところでワンすけや。
なんで、赤誠組の野郎と一緒にいやがるんだ？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_124<tab>No need to give the lad a hard time. He did right by me, and I mean to return the favor.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_124<tab>ちょっとした取引をしてな、協力してやってるんだよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_125<tab>Eh? You mean you're helpin' him? Have you gone mad!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_125なっ……協力だと！？
お前、正気か！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_126<tab>Heh, well, even if I have, it's nothing you and yours need worry your pretty little heads over. Give us a hand and we'll get out of your hair. Wolf's honor.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_126まぁまぁ、落ち着いてくれよい。
話を聞けたら、すぐに去っていくから、
しばらくの間だけ、我慢してくれや。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_127<tab>They're not a bad bunch, really. Most tried to make it living on the strait and narrow. Some even had a mind to join the Sekiseigumi, like you, but were found wanting for this reason or that.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_127ここにいるのはみんな、仕事にあぶれた奴らでな。
中には、あんたみたいに赤誠組への入隊を希望しながら、
入れなかったやつもいるんだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_128<tab>When honest work's no longer an option, that leaves the other sort. The dangerous, the disreputable, the dirty. Somebody's got to do it, and so these industrious souls pick up the slack.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_128法の狭間にあるような、危険な仕事を引き受けて、
肩身の狭い思いをしながら、どうにか日々やりくりしてる。
他に、生きるすべがないからな……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_129<tab>Maybe they're not the cream you'd prefer to hobnob with, but while you're in their company, I'd ask that you comport yourselves with a modicum of civility.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_129……そういうことだから、居心地が悪いかも知れないが、
少しの間、我慢してくれ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_130<tab>I... Ahem. I should like to believe I have done just that. You'll forgive me if I've given you any reason to think otherwise.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_130<tab>こんな世界があったとは……承知つかまつった。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_131<tab>See? Fast friends, we all are. Right, then─ We're after a bloke what goes by the moniker of Yojimbo. Heard tell of the man?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_131すまん、すまん！
で、用件なんだが……
ヨウジンボウってやつを追ってるんだが、何か知らないか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_132<tab>Yojimbo? Hmm... No, can't say it rings a bell...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_132ヨウジンボウ？
聞いたことねぇ名だな……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_100_132<tab>Oi, any of you know a fella by the name of Yojimbo?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_100_132<tab>誰か、なんか知ってるか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_133<tab>Well, there you have it. Might be different if he had a bounty on his head. What'd he do, anyway? Piss in the bugyo's rice porridge?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_133どうやら、知ってるやつはいなさそうだ。
そいつがどうしたんだ、懸賞首だったりでもするのか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_134<tab>Hah, if only! Stole the Soboro Sukehiro, he did.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_134そいつがソボロ助広を盗んで、姿を消しちまってな。
目下、追っているところなんだよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_135<tab>Bugger me, that's a beauty! Wonder why, though. Finding a buyer, even through the black market, would be a challenge and half. And if he'd even put out the word he was lookin', we'd have heard about it by now...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_135ほぉ、ソボロ助広ってか！
だが、闇市に流れたって話も聞いちゃいないぜ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_136<tab>Bah, to come all this way and leave with nothing...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_136<tab>ううむ……ここでも新たな情報は得られず、か……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_137<tab>Here, let's not call it a day just yet. Assuming this Yojimbo didn't steal the sword for the challenge, there's only two reasons he'd take it: to sell it or to keep it. And if it's not about the money, then I doubt this is his first prize─or his last.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_137気が早いぜ、赤誠組の旦那さんよ。
売るつもりがないってんなら、相手は名刀の収集家だろう。
だが、そういう奴ほど、ひと振りだけじゃ我慢できねぇもんさ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_138<tab>Hark! My keen inspector's sense whispers and speaks...of a thieving collector of swords! Yes, there can be no mistake!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_138<tab>ハッ……新たな連続名刀強奪事件の予感！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_139<tab>Aye, what he said, I suppose. If he's a collector, then only the best will do, which means his next target might be...oh, I don't know, the Ame-no-Murakumo?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_139ヘッ……そういうこった。
そして、ここいらでソボロ助広以上の名刀といえば……
神剣「アメノムラクモ」くらいだろうよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_140<tab>Wait, the Ame-no-Murakumo? But I thought that was nothing more than a faerie tale! Do you mean to say the fabled sword of eld actually exists?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_140あ、アメノムラクモと申されたか！？
そのような伝説の神器、実在するわけは……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_Q2_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_A2_000_001<tab>I've seen it with my own eyes.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_A2_000_001<tab>実在している

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_A2_000_002<tab>A giant kami tried to kill me and my friends with it, but I deflected the blow.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_A2_000_002<tab>受け止めたことがある

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_141<tab>You have? Truly? Where?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_141じ、実在しているのでござるか！？
いったい、どこに……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_142<tab>You what!? I have so many questions...but first, where did this all happen?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_142な、なんと、アメノムラクモの斬撃を、
受け止めたと申すでござるか！？
いったい、どこで……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_143<tab>Housed within the Kojin of the Red's treasure vault, eh? If that's the case, then it seems to me you ought to continue your search in the Ruby Sea, no?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_143ふーん、コウジン族の宝物殿か……。
仮に、そのヨウジンボウってやつが名刀の収集家だとすると、
紅玉海に向かったかもしれないってことだな？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_144<tab>It might well be the best place for us to look. In that case, let us─
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_144なるほど、調べてみる価値はあるか……。
じゃあ、さっそく……

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_145<tab>Let us brook no further delay and head to the Ruby Sea at once!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_145<tab>さっそく、紅玉海に向かうとしましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_146<tab>Come, my friends! The Ruby Sea awaits!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_HILDIBRAND_000_146<tab>さあ、紅玉海に向かうとしましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_147<tab>I can't wait to get back out there so I can enjoy the sun and the surf!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_147<tab>また海に行けるの、楽しみです～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_148<tab>It's like I said: they've good hearts, each and every one of them. Sometimes fate deals you a bad hand, and you've got no choice but to make the most of it.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KUGANEWOLFBURGLAR_000_148あいつらも、悪気があって、
ああいう態度をとってるわけじゃないんだ。
わかってやってくれ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_149<tab>If it's legendary swords and the like your man's after, he could do a lot worse than the Ame-no-Murakumo.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_KOJU_000_149神剣「アメノムラクモ」がコウジン族の宝物殿にあるとはな。
こいつは、いい話を聞かせてもらったぜ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_150<tab>To think that the Ame-no-Murakumo is not only real, but that it was brought to bear against you and yours by a kami of unfathomable strength...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_150伝説の神器「アメノムラクモ」が、
まさか実在していようとは……。
さすがに驚きを禁じえなかったでござるよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_151<tab>Ahem! In any event, we now know where we might search: the Ruby Sea. Before I may leave, however, there is a matter of great import to which I must attend.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_151さて、さっそく紅玉海へ向かうとしましょうぞ。
……と、その前に、ひとつだけ済ませたい用事があるゆえ、
紅玉台場で落ち合うことにさせてほしいでござる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_152<tab>Well, perhaps “great import” is something of an overstatement. I speak of the inspector's earlier advice concerning my garments.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_152なに、大したことではござらぬ。
事件屋殿が言われていた、着物の件でござるよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_153<tab>I will meet you at the Ruby Price after I have changed. Pray go on ahead without me. I insist!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB741_03150_SHIGURE_000_153着替えが終わり次第、向かうのでご安心を。
では、またのちほど！
